code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const events=[{title:"Summer Dance Camp",date:"NOT AVAILABLE NOW",description:"Learn Kathak, Hip-Hop in a fun summer camp!",image:"/images/summercmp.jpg"},{title:"Online Dance Workshop",date:"SOON",description:"Join our live online sessions from anywhere in the world.",image:"/images/online.jpg"},{title:"Classical Dance Workshop",date:"SOON",description:"Master classical moves with our professional instructors.",image:"/images/offline.jpg"}];const Events=()=>{const eventRefs=useRef([]);useEffect(()=>{eventRefs.current.forEach((el,i)=>{gsap.from(el,{opacity:1,y:50,duration:1,delay:i*0.3});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"events",className:"p-16 bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-12",children:"Upcoming Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:events.map((event,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:el=>eventRefs.current[index]=el,className:"bg-gray-100 rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-shadow duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.title,className:"w-full h-48 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-2",children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 font-bold mb-2",children:event.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700",children:event.description})]})]},index))})]});};export default Events;
